title: In My Future

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, foretell a player and a night to target them on (that isn't this night).
- If you have foretold a player to target this night, you must choose one of the following actions to perform on them (randomly chosen if no option is picked):
> Basic rampaging attack
> Redirect to yourself
> Remove one of their abilities randomly for the rest of the game

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- There are no restrictions on having multiple foretellings of the same night or person.
- You cannot be prevented from performing actions you have foretold, even if you are dead or removed from the game.
